website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon SB R1C1 is one of the most versatile macro lighting solutions we have seen to date. When paired with a Nikon SLR and macro lens, it can have you creating incredible macro photos in no time.
pros: comes with plenty of accessories, including mounting rings for lenses, stands for the flash units, filter holders, and more
cons: Kit available only with two flash heads
flashes and trigger powered by CR123A batteries

customer_reviews.title: Good flashlight
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m very happy with this flash light. One thing that is little frustrating is the batteries, I wish it was powered by regular AAs.
customer_reviews.author: Miro

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had rechargeable battery . But it works well for close up photography and when you want to get the flash off the camera
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sparks

customer_reviews.title: excellent speedlight for macrophotography
customer_reviews.text: excellent speedlight for macrophotography. Easy to use, and it allows me to take amazing macrophotos in very bad light conditions. The only problem is to get rechargables batteries. But, R1C1 is a smart investment.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Mahecha

customer_reviews.title: Great little lighting system
customer_reviews.text: The versatility of the ring plus the ability to quickly detach the lights is very valuable and has opened up a new world of photography for me. It is a perfect mini lighting kit to go along with the larger mobile lights (sb800 and sb900) that I have. I've also lived on the pocketwizards for a while and it is kind of fun to play with the Nikon lighting system again.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Ross

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE TOOL FOR MACROPHOTOGRAPHY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product if you are into macro photography... A must buy
customer_reviews.author: darshan sheth

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE IF YOU DO CLOSE UP WORK
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely must have for any photographer doing close up work and when you need lighting in a space where you can't get the normal equipment. I would suggest this unit over the R1, it costs more but has MUCH more. IT IS AWESOME....
customer_reviews.author: Phil's Coins

customer_reviews.title: Intraoral Pictures
customer_reviews.text: Graduation gift for my son finishing dental school. He was very pleased. Will be using camera for intraoral pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Maryk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Not only was I able to locate this hard to find item, the price was the best I've found. Arrived quickly and was very happy with entire process.
customer_reviews.author: D M K

customer_reviews.title: Will need a 58-62mm adapter
customer_reviews.text: You will need a 58-62mm adapter if you plan on using the 50mm prime with this kit. The system is great. Works fine. I do get strange looks from people when I am out using it because they have either never seen one, or only saw it on CSI.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nikon R1C1 Wireless Close-Up Speedlight Kit
customer_reviews.text: Excelent equipment as usual from Nikon. Nice carrying case and ease of instalation on my different close-up lenses. Required setup and configurations are straighforward with impressive results.
customer_reviews.author: bruce clark

product_meta.title: Nikon R1C1 Wireless Close-Up Speedlight Kit for Nikon Digital SLR Cameras
product_meta.description: For use with use with Nikon i-TTL SLRs without built-in Speedlights including D2X, D2HS, D2H and F6
feature_bullets: For use with use with Nikon i-TTL SLRs without built-in Speedlights including D2X, D2HS, D2H and F6
